userId.description: The unique identifier for the user.

subscriptionStatus.description: The current status of the user's subscription.

subscriptionPlan.description: The name or tier of the subscription plan.

nextBillingDate.description: The date and time of the next billing or renewal.

billingFrequency.description: The frequency of the billing cycle.

amount.description: The amount to be billed for the subscription.

currency.description: The currency in which the subscription is billed (e.g., USD, EUR).

lastPaymentDate.description: The date and time when the last payment was processed.
